<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cloak of Elvenkind](/Equipment.aspx?ID=424)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 608 <sup>4.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn cloak

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This cloak is deep green with a voluminous hood, embroidered with gold trim and symbols significant in elven culture. The cloak allows you to cast the _[ghost sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132)_ cantrip as an arcane innate spell. When you adjust the cloak’s clasp (an Interact action), the cloak transforms to match the environment around you and muffles your sounds, granting you a +1 item bonus to Stealth checks.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You draw the hood up and gain the effects of [_invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=164), with the spell's normal duration or until you pull the hood back down, whichever comes first. If you're also wearing _[boots of elvenkind](/Equipment.aspx?ID=413)_, you can activate this ability twice per day.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

Cloak of Elvenkind
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 12"
pfs="Standard"
>
Cloak of Elvenkind (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 608 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Price** 1,750 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The cloak grants a +2 item bonus, and the effects of 4th-level _invisibility_. If you’re also wearing _boots of elvenkind_, the _greater cloak of elvenkind_ allows you to Sneak in forest environments even when creatures are currently observing you.
